amendment.description: Amendment strengthens language requiring a feasibility study of Tulsa and West Tulsa levees; prioritizes the project if study classifies levee or levee system Class I or Class II.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bridenstine amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Bridenstine.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bridenstine amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
